correctness.rationale: Significant schema violations and factual issues. (a) Numerous required numeric fields are null, violating the schema (e.g., processParameters.pressure.quantityValue.numericValue, thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.values[*].value.quantityValue.numericValue, thicknessControl.numberofCycles.quantityValue.numericValue, nucleationPeriod.quantityValue.numericValue, dosingTime[*].*.quantityValue.numericValue, purgeTime[*].*.quantityValue.numericValue, flowRates[*].*.quantityValue.numericValue, and multiple materialProperties fields including uniformity, conformality, elementalConcentration, roughness, filmDensity). (b) Temperature is incorrectly set to 20 °C; the article does not report an IGZO deposition temperature, while 20 °C is not plausible for PEALD deposition. (c) Plasma power 100 W is taken from the SiO2 process, not explicitly reported for IGZO; not traceable to the IGZO deposition. (d) SupercycleDesign uses a non-integer count (ZnO = 1.3) and equates atomic ratio (2:1:1.3) to subcycle counts without support in the text; the article only reports composition ratio, not subcycle design. (e) Device subthreshold swing is encoded with the wrong unit/value: 0.20 V/dec was reported, but 0.2 mV is provided; it should be 200 mV if using mV units. (f) On/off ratio 0.96 is incorrect and not reported in the article (appears to duplicate Vth). (g) Carrier/purging gas set to Ar without textual support; saturation true and deliveryMethod/otherAspects values are not substantiated. (h) Reactor fields and several characterizationMethod fields are set to 'Not Found' and many values are missing, reducing traceability. (i) Multiple ALD processes (ALD SiO2 and Al2O3 for buffer and GI) described in the article are not represented as separate processes. Correct or remove unsupported entries, replace nulls with valid, traceable values, fix SS units, remove or justify supercycle design, and ensure full schema compliance.

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete and schema‐noncompliant. (1) Missing processes: The article reports multiple ALD depositions (IGZO channel, ALD SiO2 GI/buffer at 250 °C with Ar/O2 plasma 100 W and DIPAS, ALD Al2O3 GI/buffer at 200 °C with TMA/H2O, and a stacked GI SiO2/Al2O3 for device E). The extraction includes only a single IGZO process and omits separate processes for SiO2, Al2O3, and the stacked GI, so the full experimental set is not represented. (2) Schema violations and nulls: Many required numeric fields are null (pressure, GPC, numberofCycles, nucleationPeriod, dosingTime, purgeTime, flowRates, uniformity variation, conformality aspectRatio, elementalConcentration, etc.), and several optional fields are filled with placeholders (“Not Found”), violating the no-empty/no-null requirement. (3) Incorrect/unsupported values: Temperature set to 20 °C (no IGZO deposition temperature reported), plasmaPower 100 W appears for SiO2 ALD but is not reported for IGZO PEALD, carrier/purging gases are asserted without support, and onOffRatio (0.96) is not provided in the article. SS is reported as 0.20 V/dec in the article but encoded as 0.2 with unit MilliV (i.e., 0.2 mV), a 1000× error and unit mismatch. (4) Supercycle design misinterpretation: numberofSubcycles uses the measured cation ratio 2:1:1.3, including a fractional 1.3 ‘cycles’, which is scientifically invalid and not reported; supercycle counts are not provided in the article. (5) Traceability gaps: Several entries (reactor details, deliveryMethod, filmStability/reproducibility) are not supported by the text. (6) Partial/incorrect material properties: Only the IGZO atomic ratio is supported (RBS), but characterizationMethod is left as “Not Found”; other required material property fields are left empty. To improve completeness: add separate ALD processes for SiO2 (DIPAS, Ar/O2 plasma 100 W, 250 °C) and Al2O3 (TMA/H2O, 200 °C), include the stacked GI process E, correct SS to 200 mV/dec, remove unsupported on/off ratio and placeholder fields, omit plasma power for IGZO unless reported, remove invalid supercycle counts, and fill filmComposition method as RBS.
